title: Fertility rate in Sub-Saharan Africa 2017
yAxis: Number of children born per woman
summary: Overall Number of children born per woman has decreased over the Year.
Number of children born per woman is slightly decreasing from 2011 to 2016.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2014 and 2015.
The highest Number of children born per woman, of value 5.2 was reached at Year 2011
Minimum Number of children born per woman about 4.84 was reached at Year 2016
min_summary: In general Number of children born per woman has fallen over the Year.
Number of children born per woman is slightly decreasing from 2011 to 2016.
mid_summary: In general Number of children born per woman has fallen over the Year.
